RECORD:
Rare disease patients have complex clinical representations. Patients with Febrile Seizures, Familial, 6 present clinical features that include febrile seizures, generalized tonic-clonic seizures, and/or focal seizures. Febrile Seizures, Familial, 6 is associated with epilepsy, mental retardation, and autism. Febrile Seizures, Familial, 6 is caused by mutations in the SCN1A. Some special cases also present with aphasia, hemiparesis, and/or ataxia.
